---
title: "ActionSpace"
description: ""
---



## Fields

<ParamField path="description" type="str" required>
  Human-readable description of the current web page
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="interaction_actions" type="Sequence[Annotated[UnionType[ClickAction, FillAction, MultiFactorFillAction, FallbackFillAction, CheckAction, SelectDropdownOptionAction, UploadFileAction, DownloadFileAction], annotation=NoneType required=True discriminator='type']]" required>
  List of available interaction actions in the current state
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="category" type="UnionType[SpaceCategory, None]">
  Category of the action space (e.g., 'homepage', 'search-results', 'item')
</ParamField>


## Module

`notte_core.space`
